# Todo App

<span>This app is responsible for adding, editing and deleting tasks that can be grouped in categories</span>

! [Page] (https://hossanna.github.io/TODO-jquery)

<span>Technologies used - HTML, CSS, JS, JQUERY, AJAX </span>
